content.detailedDescription: I was laying down watching a movie when a bright light outside my patio window caught my attention it was going fast towards the ground it was heading north east i really thought i just witnessed a plane crash but there was no explosion it was a bright solid light it didn't have a tale it was just solid very bright and pretty good size it was going pretty fast
content.summary: I seen a large bright light it looked like a airplane going down but there was no explosion

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on a stool wiping down the windows of the inside of an ocean front beach house we were staying at manzanita oregon.  i seen this large orange-ish red planet shaped light, but i thought it was too orange and too large to be star or planet.  i was commenting to my sister about it when i saw another shoot out and upward from behind the first one and kind of hovered there, then another one shot out downward from behind it and hovered around the first one. i grabbed up my phone to use the camera and my sister and i ran to the front deck watching,  we commenting that we were pretty positive they had to be ufo's, . i turned my video recording on and was watching through it as i recorded them. , as the 2nd orb which had shot upwards, took off then quickly disappeared into the clouds, the last two hovered together, seeming like they were communicating while they were bobbing in and out towards and away from each other; then the second one looked to have disappeared as the main one faded off. 
when i plugged my camera into my computer there wasn't any recordings, but we had watched it recording?? 
we then checked online to see if anyone else had reported seeing this.
but we have not found any so far.
content.summary: Wiping down the inside windows of the beach house saw large orange orb stationary in the sky over the ocean.

content.detailedDescription: On 7/22/14 watching impending thunderstorm. white orb comes out of cloud bank, proceeds to rendezvous with sun, go behind it, and re-emerges. hovers. red glowing.
content.summary: The orb came out of a cloud bank, flew up and behind the sun and hovered.

content.detailedDescription: On 7/22/14 watching impending thunderstorm. white orb comes out of cloud bank, proceeds to rendezvous with sun, go behind it, and re-emerges. hovers. red glowing.
content.summary: The orb came out of a cloud bank, flew up and behind the sun and hovered.

content.detailedDescription: A neighbor friend called me around 9:50 pm as she was walking her dog and asked me to come outside.  i saw her waiting by the street and she point to the northwestern sky and asked me what was that up there.  at first, i said oh that's either a gaseous planet/sun that is usually up in that area but this thing was about 4 times the size of the star that would be in that area.  the round/spherical planet like object was a lot larger than the star i first thought it was.  the star is normally a pen mark in the sky and this light was about 4 times larger (even closer and very bright).  the main light was a bright white round shape which was pulsating colors off all around it, yellowish/orangish, bluish, red.  this light wasn't quite to the horizon line yet and we stood there watching it for nearly 5 minutes.  the neighbor thought that it moved a bit to the northwest but i thought that it could be the illusion of the lights being thrown off the side of it in that direction.  i asked her to take a ride up the road a bit to get into a tree clearing that we could see more of the sky in and we both went to lock our doors and head to the car and when we came out not five minutes later this thing was gone (and not passed the horizon line either).  we took a ride due west about three miles to where there are no trees and you could clearly see this round spherical object was completely gone and there were no clouds in that area blocking any light.  we did have small wispy clouds over us but you could see other stars through them and there were no thicker type clouds around.  we both also knew this wasn't a plane as it was stationary for the most part and didn't have the usual plane lights.  it also couldn't have been a satellite as they don't just stop and throw off various colored lights.  if that was a planet than it's path must've come a lot closer to earth than i've ever seen it in the past nine years.  i've been out watching this area of the sky for the past two nights and the planet i first thought it was is very small off in the distance and doesn't resemble what we saw two nights ago.
content.summary: Planet like object flashing various colors

content.detailedDescription:
Basically i was driving to my parents home which is in north scottsdale i was heading north on 46th street and i see this very silver almost chrome light with no visable structure or body hovering just above the houses in the area it moved fluidly from west to east maintaining the same hight it was close to me i'd say less then 20 30 feet it turned around making a small loop and headed back the same direction it came where it disappeared behind trees/houses at first i thought it was a fire work but it moved to slowly and i don't believe fire works move horizontally so ya i'm not sure what i saw but i pulled over and had a mini panic attack after this all happened i didn't think quickly enough to reach for my phone /camera i was quite petrified which was a very strange feeling  i really would love to know if anyone else saw what i saw tonight in phoenix arizona the picture i included is a horrible sketch i made after the event happened
. of the trajectory of the object in the sky just above house level
content.summary: low flying close proximity silver light over phoenix  arizona

content.detailedDescription: Husband woke at 2:00 am in night and saw light out bedroom window.  he thought it must be a jet with lights aimed at house. i woke at 3 a.M. and saw he light out the window.  i awoke him and he told me he saw it at 2:00 a.M.  we watched it for over an hour.  it remained unmoved and was stationery all that time.  we looked with the binoculars, but as with the eye, the light was so bright it hurt to look at it.  we went back to bed around 4 a.M. and watched it occasionally out the window till the dawn.  once the sun came up in the east you could not see the light for having to look into the sun.  we live in a very remote area.  no airports or air travel in this area except at a great elevation.  i have seen weather balloons in this area before in the daytime, but they drift over.  this was stationery and highly illuminated with a terribly bright light.  it was way too large and bright to be a mistaken star.  i look out that window every night and never saw anything like it before.  there are no towers or buildings in this area.  very remote.  please contact me if you get other reports. i tried to takea picture but couldn't get enough light inside the house.  i was afraid to go outside.  it really felt like a giant headlight beam that was huge and nver moved.
content.summary: Light stationery in sky for 3 1/2 hours, so bright it was hard to look at it, 1/10 size of moon

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bed where i have a view of the stars which i watch everytime i can see them before i fall asleep. i have seen the iss many times go by when i am in my bed, i thought at first it was the iss i was looking observing. all of a sudden it was about 10 times brighter than the iss and 5 times the size. it was traveling about the same speed as the iss but it changed direction. then it decreased in brightness and came to a complete stop. you may question how high this objecct was because i cannot prove that it was in orbit, i do have an educated conclusion what i saw was in orbit and things we make do not change direction then stop. the brightness was like a shooting star type bright, i have never seen anything like it before. i have other stories but this one was my best sighting of all.
content.summary: I live in the country and sleep where i can see the stars in the area of the big diipper. i have seen some interesting sightings over the years, this one is the best.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was coming home from work at 5:30 in the morning. 
2. i have notice a bright light as i was driving up my street. it was way to close (i tought it was an airplane) but it have not moved for over three hours. 
the object looked like it  was just sitting in the air. however the camera captured a weird movement. 
i was looking at "the light" getting farther and farther up in the air as the daylight came.
content.summary: It looked like a very bright  light. at first i tought it was an airplane, but as i looked closer it did not move for over there hours. as the daylight came "the light"  slowly upper in the air.

content.detailedDescription: Driving my daughter & granddaughter home - my daughter and i witnessed low in the sky approx. 6 lights fading in and out in a circular pattern - then 2 lights would meet in the middle and then go back to the circular pattern.
content.summary: In a circulaar pattern lights blinking

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10:12 pm i was walking past my bedroom window.    i am a sky watcher and we live south of the msp airport.  i enjoy watching aircraft land.   i noticed a strange formation of aircraft traveling from the west to the east.  this is a typical flight path for some aircraft on approach to the airport.  however the close proximity of the aircraft together was not a typical. the formation of the lights was 4 leading in a diamond formation with two trailing the main group.  as they traveled i was expecting to see navigation lights as they approached. however there was no red, green, or white navigation lights present.  the lights were also much more amber than most aircraft i have observed.  from my position i could also see what appeared to be an airplane departing from msp.  the lights appeared to turn and headed north, i was able to see the big dipper in the sky and from my position they disappeared where the lower left star in the pan would be.  two of the first four disappeared then followed by the other two a few seconds later.  the two trailing lights did not turn but continued east.  i was not able to see the flight path.   assuming this was the end of the sighting i went downstairs just to see if i would be able to see them again on the eastern part of my house.   i was no longer able to see them, however upon looking west again i noticed another light following the same path as the previous.   i tried to get my phone ready to record but the light turned north and was gone before i could do so.  i then began to fi out this report and i then observed the 8th light.  i did capture some video but the light was pretty dim and i was not able to zoom very well. i will add what i did capture to the report. the last light also turned north and vanished.   none of these lights had any visible navigation lights as i mentioned.  the aircraft that i could see on actual approach to msp have very visible lights. the craft traveled at roughly (although a little slower) the same speed as the air traffic to the airport.
content.summary: Formation of lights traveling from west to east over msp

content.detailedDescription:
This is chris' brother bret.  he told me to file this report.  his electricity is off in the house but his phone was working when we talked.  

this evening, i think around 8 pm or so, the electricity in his entire house went off.  just after that he said that my nephew said he saw a white fireball object about the size of a suburban pass by the house trailing stuff behind it.  he saw it through a window.  

he lives in the country about 5 miles downstream from george bush's ranch in crawford, texas.  this is not the first time that some funky stuff regarding aerospace things have happened out there.
content.summary: The lights went out in the house.  then a white fireball went by.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside of work and looked over to the horizon.  saw the first red light come up from behind the city skyline, ascending and moving left to right.  soon after another one of the same size and same light followed behind it.  they were travelling in groups of 3, forming what looked like a triangle between them.   there were 5 groups altogether.  about 15 minutes after they went overhead, (no noise whatsoever) there was a black helicopter flying from sw to ne, the lights were traveling ne to sw.  

my cell phone lost signal for the duration of the event.  tried to snap some pictures but every time i clicked the on screen shutter on my phone the screen would just turn off.
content.summary: 15 red silent lights changing direction then getting in formation

content.detailedDescription: I was patching a tarp in my yard when suddenly the tarp blew over me and covered me. i got myself out of the tarp and looked up into the sky where i saw a disc shaped object about the size of a quarter.I stood and watched it moving in a way that was not consistent with a normal aircraft. i watched it for what seemed like a minute when i remembered that i had my cell phone on my work bench. i grabbed it and turned back to where i had last seen the object. i began recording and the light became very bright so i couldn't see what i was recording so i just held the phone up hoping i was getting the object on the camera. finally, my eyes where watering so badly from the blinding light i had to stop the recording and put the phone down so i could rub my eyes. about 30 seconds after i stopped the recording and lost sight of the object, 2 military jets flew over traveling in the direction that i had last seen the object. while i was recording i didn't feel any fear, just excitement and hope that i was catching the object on video. i went back into the house and watched the video and realized that i had in fact caught the object. i showed the video to my wife and we downloaded it onto our computer so we could watch it frame by frame. when we did this we saw that near the end of the video there are 2 objects, one smaller and one larger.
content.summary: Working in my yard. wind blew. saw an object in the sky. grabbed my phone.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my yard lying on my chaise lounge.  i looked up and saw this cluster of objects and further up in the sky were two tiny objects in a straight line not far from one another.  i went and got my camera and came back and took a picture, but i wasn't sure i could catch it being so far away.  i have no idea what these objects were, but i only looked away for a minute after taking the pictures and they had vanished.  i thought the big cluster might be a satellite but the two lights off to its side i hadn't a clue.  they never moved until they vanished.
content.summary: A cluster  of objects was not far from two objects that were close to one another in a straight line

content.detailedDescription:
My name is keith farrior, i am writing this for my brother who right now is in a nursing home but will soon be getting out and going home. he doesn't have a computer so he wanted me to tell his story

our family had a vacation home in gulf shores,alabama. on about monday night, june 14th, 1965 the entire family looked out over the gulf of mexico and noticed three seperate groups of lights. one group of lights would gradually fade out and then re-appear on the other side of the other lights. they did this going back and forth routine for about 25 minutes. the other family members went back into the house. lawrence went down to the beach. on the way he noticed a figure in the window of a craft and then heard a voice that told him to lay down. as he was lying down his mind was receiving a message and it sounded like an audio reel to reel tape going in fast forward. as he was hearing this he was thinking,"boy, this is going too fast" at which time the voice said,"don't worry, when the time is right you will understand". after this was over, lawrence was told to stand up,which he did. the next thing he remembers is that he was walking down the road towards the beach house.At this time another voice told him that he was going to be working for his father for 12 1/2
years. lawrence thought this was crazy because our father was a doctor and lawrence was in music and playing in bands. in 1985, my fathers nurse got re-married and her new husband wouldn't let her work,so my father asked lawrence if he wanted to do it and lawrence told him that he would. lawrence worked for my father from june of 1985 until december 31st, 1997. he had worked for our father for 12 1/2 years just like the voice said.

this is just the beginning of events that have been going on now for 50 years. here's just a quick summary of events that have happened:
1) 1967: strange lights observed while driving home from a concert in livingston alabama.
2) 1968:destin florida- lots of lights moving just above swamp land and a voice telling him,"everything is parallel".
3) 1969: went shooting. hit a post about 30 yards away,ricochet back to him in very slow motion, hit him and the bullet just fell to the ground.
4) 1978: may 8th, 1978 an aircraft lands in escambia bay. on his way over to see it,his wife and lawrence see a strange light coming towards them. the car loses all electrical power and stops. after light passes car starts up like nothing happened.
5) late 1980's: had more encounters while living in gulf breeze florida where our family had moved to in 1967. it was during this time that lawrence received another voice message:"don't tempt the fates which lie before you,for you shall surely loose".
6) 2015: lawrence was leaving his house to run up to the store. found a design that was drawn on the hood of his car in the snow. didn't have a camera so he drew the design on paper. i wll include this drawing in a attachment when i send this information to you.

lawrence has quite a story to tell and he is still able and willing to tell it. all he needs is someone that will listen. reading this does not do justice to his information. you need to hear him tell it for i have probably left out some vital information.

thank you for allowing me the opportunity to share this information with you. i hope someone can actually contact lawrence,sit down with him and let him tell you everything that has been happening over the past 50 years. i think you will leave with a different feeling as to what is really going on out there.

sincerely,
keith farrior
content.summary: Three groups of lights that were hovering over the gulf of mexico

content.detailedDescription: I have a video but it will not upload on here, so please contact me back with a email address so i can email over video
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Astonishing

content.detailedDescription: Estava no 2º andar de mina casa, no povoado de santo antônio do rio grande, município de bocaina de minas, estado de minas gerais, br, as 11:00 da manhã,do dia 23 de setembro de 2008, quando observei uma luz muito brilhante, igual a uma estrela, a lado do sol.  me protegi em uma parede, para não olhar para o sol diretamente, e fiquei observando.  parecida parado, mas, estava se deslocando muito lentamente, como se estivesse acompanhando a rotação da terra.  observei também, o som de um jato supersônico da aeronáutica, nesse momento.   quando tirava o olho do objeto, e voltava a vê-lo, observei que se deslocava lentamente.   passou por cima de minha casa, em construção, sem laje  e, observei que o brilho continuava, apesar de observá-lo por baixo .   o brilho envolvia todo o objeto, conclusão que cheguei depois dos seguintes acontecimentos :   o objeto parou a cerca de uns 300 metros e ali ficou por cerca de uns 15 minutos .   nessa ocasião, passou uma nuvem, que estimo estar a cerca de 800 m a 1000 m de altitude e para minha surpresa o brilho do objeto sumiu e de uma forma de bola, vi nitidamente que era uma forma retangular (vista de lado), de cor cinza escuro.   a nuvem passou e novamente voltou o brilho refletivo, que agora atribui ser refletido do sol e não luz própria .  novamente, passou uma segunda nuvem e, os fatos se repetiram .   nesse instante, desci da minha casa, e chamei duas (2) testemunhas .  o sr. joaquim e a filha de uma amiga de nome jackeline .  ficamos observando e o objeto começou a se deslocar no mesmo ritimo de antes, vagarosamente, agora em uma direção de 90º , sem fazer manobras alguma, quando novamente parou a cerca de uns 400 metros.  ali permaneceu parado por uns 15 minutos e do zero, partiu com uma velocidade incrível, parecendo o arranque de um carro de corrida .  pude observar também, que antes do deslocamento repentino, momentos antes, tive a impressão que o objeto se estremeceu e de disparou em direção se .   curioso, que logo depois desse acontecimento, um famoso cantor de pagode, chamado zeca pagodinho, veia na tv e também se pronunciou ter visto um disco voador no seu local preferido,de descanso, em xerém, estado do rio de janeiro .  durante esse evento, também pude observar, um avião da fab passar 5 vezes no local, dando a entender que já estava em perseguição ao objeto e, por isso, ele parou sob o sol , para não poder ser enxergando pelo piloto .  essa observação, do jato supersônico,foi feita pela audição, já que foi impossível vê-lo passando e possivelmente estava muito alto e por cima das nuvens .   o objeto estava na alturas das nuvens . anexo a foto do povoado onde foi feita a observação .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Estava parado ao lado do sol, como uma estrela muito brilhante, se deslocou lentamente em direção ne, paraou a uns 300 metros e depois se deslocou  a 90º uns 400 metros, em sentido se, parou novamente, depois, disparou do zero com uma veloc. incrível

content.detailedDescription: While sitting on my patio enjoying a bonfire last sunday night i was looking up at the stars and watching for anything that was moving. several planes flew far above us and a few satellites were observed. then as i was scan back toward the north i saw a movement that looked transparent and it neither reflected nor gave off and light. almost seemed to magnify the stars that were visible and a little distorted through it. no sound was emitted and it was hard to tel at what altitude it was at. it was gone before any of the others could react to my wtf was that statement. it seemed to be in a level flight without any course changes while i observed it. it was gone in about 10 to 15 seconds from start to when it disappeared from view.
content.summary: Flew over head late sunday night.

content.detailedDescription: My husband, i and my 2 children were out in the country at my in-laws farm between athol and kensington kansas about 2 miles south of highway 36. my 2 children were about 5 and 6 years old at the time.   we were coming out of the house facing south and saw a very bright light coming from the south not very high in the sky.  it skimmed over the people's house that lived across the road but they were an elderly couple and i'm sure they were probably in bed at the time.  i did not ask them about it either.   i'm guessing at the time and date of this incident because i did not write anything down about it. the ufo came right directly for us and we stood and watched as it moved over us very slowly.  this round object had lights around the middle. i'm not sure what the diameter was but i'm guessing about 28 feet. it just skimmed the top of the house just missing the tv antenna so it was very close to us.   it did not make a whisper of a sound and the dog did not appear to see it or hear it as he did not move.  we were all in awe and said nothing until it was behind the house and out of sight.  my husband, kids and i jumped into our vehicle and drove quickly around the house and up the dirt round behind the house.  the object was gone, just poof - like it was never there.   we never did talk about it and i don't even remember why.  i suppose back then we thought people would think we were crazy and of course back then the video cameras and phones were not anything that people had and no one carried a camera around with them all the time.  we did not even talk about it between ourselves that i remember but i know i had told my parents.  i watch the history channel with the ufo sightings and this is when it all came back to me.   i ask my oldest child if she remembered and she did not.   my husband and i are divorced and have been since 1985 so i of course do not ask him. in 1978 my in-laws moved to the town of kensington and we moved to the farm.  i was never afraid to be there alone.   my family always liked to lay out in lawn chairs at night in the yard to watch the stars and watch for ufo's but we never did see anything ever again. to this day i believe what we saw was an alien craft and after hearing people talk about their experiences i realize that mine is so similar in the fact that maybe the aliens did something to ensure that we did not talk about it nor were we afraid. my in-laws and my parents are all deceased now.  i guess unless my ex-husband remembers i'm the only one that remembers that incident.   my husband still lives on that farm.  his name is dennis (deke) beckmann and is about 65 years old.  his wife's name is tracy.   i'm 62.
content.summary: On a farm and standing outside and saw bright light coming from the south.  it came directly over the house just scimming the top of the house.  no sound, no appenent windows, moved very slowly.  we jumped into vehicle to follow it but it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: We were on our way to key west with my brother and nephew on a fishing trip when we saw a ufo like figure appear in the sky over the ocean. it was there for about two minutes then it disappeared and never came back.
content.summary: Saw a ufo figure on our way to key west

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving home for work 430a as i got isaw a flash and looked up and a large cigar shaped black object with red,white,green lights the size was amazing it was as big as an aircraft carrier it made no sound as passed overhead i couldn't believe what i seeing when i first i knew it wasn't an airplane simply due the sheer size and lack of noise as i watched it seemed to skip across the sky it was traveled from a southwest direction to a northeast direction i was so in awe what i was seeing by time i pulled out my phone to film it had passed all i managed to get was the lights on each showing the incredible size of this thing then it winked out and was gone
content.summary: Went to get in the car for caught flashed and looked and saw an ufo the size of and aircraft carrier that made no noise as it passed over my head

content.detailedDescription: I went out in my yard early in the morning while still dark to listen for elk bugles. i was looking up at the stars because i live in the country and have no light contamination. looking at a small cluster of stars when one flashed like a camera flash, then it was gone. the object was in space, it was not close.
content.summary: Thought i was looking at stars, one flashed very bright and then was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I have 2 videos of it. i was meditating outside early morning like every day, and i thought i heard someone call my name. i looked up from where i was sitting outside and the it was sitting in the sky,spinning and changing colors. i felt warm inside like i was getting the biggest love filled hug ever. when i first saw it, it was like it was there for me. so much in fact, i smiled as soon as i saw it. i continued meditating with om mani padme hum mantra and kept my eyes locked on it. i felt like i didn't want him to leave. i think it was michael the archangel. that's the only thought that kept popping in my head and it was like i was telling myself "it's alright" over and over in my head. i actually followed it across town in my car, it kept dimming and reappearing. until after a while it faded out on an ascent. i felt happier than i've ever felt in my life. please, take me seriously. i've been having a number of strange occurrences since before this morning. maybe you can point me in the right direction.
content.summary: I have 2 videos of it. i was meditating, and i thought i heard someone call my name. i looked up from where i was sitting outside and the it was. spinning and changing colors.

content.detailedDescription: I was woken up around 3.30 in morning, with a bright light filling the bedroom, i then looked out of bedroom window, notice bright light hovering, then moving away from house slowly, i watched it until it went though low cloud,which must have been about 2/3 miles away.It maintained the same height to the point of going though the cloud. i believe this is the same craft i have reported before. we live in a small hamlet with a church. has the church or the ground its built on, got some thing to do with this craft. as i have seen it quite a few times before just hovering in the same area.Including day time.
content.summary: Very bright light

content.detailedDescription: Take off 3 lights one by one then form triangle and move slowly.
content.summary: Take off lights.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside walking my cat. my bf was out there too. i was looking up in the sky as i always do looking for these strange objects. and then i seen 1 object solid with a solid white light. than another one popped up right behind it out of nowhere. then disappeared, a then reappeared. and then we didn't see them anymore. my bf seen one of them. these had no sounds. i know what planes look and sound like. jets and personal airplanes. we do have a small plane airport here. i've seen military maneuvers here as well. we live in a tiny town of southern missouri. i have been seen these lights and not sure what they are. another night i seen another white light object travel from south to the north west. solid light. no sound. it even brightened up then dimmed again. and that night the neighbors cattle was bellowing and dogs too. i keep a look at the sky now. strange lights i have no clue what they are. also seen a solid dimmed light like a star go from south east to north east tonight 9-11-2015 at around 8 pm
content.summary: 2 white objects spotted south east.

content.detailedDescription:
Visiting daughter in the horizen subdivision off crystal springs, in leander,
texas.  i was standing in front yard looking upward at the stars in the clear half of the sky at 12:03 am, when above the tree tops glided a clearly formed boomerang shaped "cloud".  it glided silently out of the northwest heading straight towards the southwest.  it disappeared when it passed under the part of the sky with cloud cover. it had a wing span comparable to a 747.
content.summary: Cloud shaped boomerang

content.detailedDescription: My daughter melissa was returning from the market at 9:30pm. she saw a red orb in the sky just prior to calling me on my cellphone. as i opened the driveway gate so my daughter could park her car she pointed the orb out to me and we started watching it closely.  we observed the object hovering, traveling in a straight line, and then making nearly a 90 degree turn to the south.  the object then flickered out and was no longer visible after the minute that we observed it.  the object was not lighted like an aircraft and the object was much more luminous than any aircraft that i've seen.  the level of flight did not seem to change so i don't believe we were seeing a flare.  the abrupt change of direction rules out a balloon.  my daughter took four photos of the object on her cell phone. i felt excited as did my daughter about seeing this common ufo shape.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Father and daughter observe red-orange sphere

content.detailedDescription: My children and i were in the aquarium parking lot speaking to a family friend. we were standing facing the water.  i happened to notice a bright light moving low and slowly overhead.  i immediately stopped talking and looked up in amazement.  everyone noticed my reaction and looked too.  it had a solid color similar to that of the sun but it wasn't hurtful to the eyes.  it made no noise and continued on a straight path out towards the sound.
content.summary: Witnessed bright light move slowly over flatts inlet.
